content:
Customer Request:
"Please remove husband from my plan. While I have you, I also need to reduce the amount of data available on my plan since he won't be using it anymore. Right now I have 8GB of data, and I will only need 6gb in the future. Also, I want bundle my internet with my cell phone service. Can you give me information on how to get started?"

Using the customer's request above, assign the right action based on the list of actions defined below that a customer service representative should take. When giving the output, do so as a yaml with an output header and include actions, include the action IDS, and when available, extract all entity values for the entity type specified. If an action does not apply to the utterance, return "NA" in place of the ID. Do not be verbose, do not explain your reasoning.

Here are some actions a customer can take regarding their cell phone plan:

Action_98:
- Description: Add family member to plan
- ID: a3293

Action_34
-ID: yee304
- Description: change phone number
Action_41:
- ID: ldl1113
- Description: check account balance

Action_12:
- Description: remove data from plan
- ID: 111f93
- Entity/slot_type: new data amount, Example entity/slot_value: "2gb"

chosen:
output
---
-   Action_12:
        ID: 111f93
        Entity/slot_type: new data amount
        Entity/slot_value: "6gb"
       - Action_98:
          ID: NA
       - Action_34:
          ID: NA
       - Action_41:
          ID: NA
rejected:

        Entity/slot_value: yes
        Output:

                Entity/slot_type: none
                Entity/slot_value: None
